Uses of Class
com.fredwilby.math.mandelbrot.ui.RDEvent

  • Packages that use RDEvent 
    Package Description
    com.fredwilby.math.mandelbrot.calc
    This package contains classes that calculate iteration values of the mandelbrot set and that allow the conversion of coordinates between the complex plain and a pixel image.
    com.fredwilby.math.mandelbrot.ui
    This package contains the UI Code for the Mandelbrot viewer / renderer, including the main class, MFrame.
